summary: The film looks at those who are desperately trying to connect or reconnect with their families, friends, or anyone who will listen.
cast: Nina Andresen Borud|Arianit Berisha|Joachim Calmeyer|Trond Fausa|Levi Henriksen|Cecile Mosli|Patrick Mölleken|Igor Necemer|Tomas Norström|Kai Remlow|Morten Ilseng Risnes|Sarah Bintu Sakor|Issaka Sawadogo|Kristine Rui Slettebakken|Nadja Soukup|Kyrre Haugen Sydness|Fridtjov Såheim|Reidar Sørensen|Nina Zanjani|Ingunn Beate Øyen
title: A casa por Navidad
